definitions.text: march aggressively into another's territory by military force for the purposes of conquest and occupation
to intrude upon, infringe, encroach on, violate
examples: This new colleague invades my territory
The neighbors intrude on your privacy

definitions.text: occupy in large numbers or live on a host
examples: the Kudzu plant infests much of the South and is spreading to the North

definitions.text: penetrate or assault, in a harmful or injurious way
examples: The cancer had invaded her lungs
